inscription: Left, embossed: 一九六三年作天龍寺の庭 {1963nen saku, Tenryū-ji no niwa}; bottom, in pencil: Tenryuji Garden
markings: LRC red artist\'s seal: 吉田 {Yoshida}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Tenryūji Garden
